name: Legendary Mosaics 3: Eagle Owl Saves the World
description: Welcome back to the Enchanted Forest. The Dwarf, Terrible Cat, and friends will have to put their knowledge of alchemy to the test when mysterious portals appear and strange monsters begin to emerge!

name: Red Johnson's Chronicles 1+2
description: You play the role of Red Johnson, a private detective who is trying to find his place in the corrupted city of Metropolis. You are taken on by the police who want you to solve a murder with no corpse.

name: New Yankee 9: The Evil Spellbook - Collector's Edition
description: Travel back to the days of King Arthur to defeat an evil spell book with plans to claim Camelot as its own!

name: Incredible Dracula 4: Game of Gods - Collector's Edition
description: Incredible Dracula IV - Game of Gods Collector's Edition puts you face-to-face in a thrilling showdown with a god. Outsmart the deity with your wit, humor, and strategy. Featuring drop-dead gorgeous visuals and a story that will keep you in stitches, this is one strategic journey you won't soon forget. Discover Incredible Dracula IV - Game of Gods Collector's Edition today!

name: Five Nights at F***boy's: Complete Collection
description: Five Nights at F---boy’s is a FNaF fangame series created in RPG Maker VX Ace featuring f---ing unfair difficulty, text-to-speech voice acting, and beautiful, beautiful animatronic yiffing. Here, these games are remade in the Complete Collection edition, upgraded in RPG Maker MV.

name: SGS Glory Recalled
description: Relive the Battle of Hong Kong (8–26 December 1941), one of the first battles of the Pacific War in World War II.

name: RetroDrift: Retrowave Online Road
description: Dive into the atmosphere of the 80's, rushing along the neon roads towards the sunset, letting your supercar drift, enjoying the wonderful tracks in retrowave style.

name: Kuma: The Environmental Protector
description: A fantasy based Action-RPG game with main hero Kuma the bear. Aside from being a bear Kuma is also The Environmental Protector with the mission to protect the forest from pollution by killing all humans. The game contains fast paced combat along with jumping puzzles and clever mechanics.

name: Infiltraliens
description: Infiltraliens is an action adventure game in which you take on the role of Gorp. Place 52, the world's most advanced and well-guarded military base is holding your alien friends captive. Can you make your way through the obstacles and pass the guards to save them?

name: Cubes and Knights
description: You are strong and huge, you have a heavy sword in your hands, and somewhere deep an ancient evil is hidden. The King himself sent you on a difficult campaign: to find the immortal enemy of all people. Find ancient artifacts and work your way through the labyrinths with steel and magic.

name: Turbo Shot
description: Turbo Shot combines a puzzle-filled top-down adventure with exciting gun-based combat that plays out in regular seasons of free-to-play single player and PvP content.

name: Tor-tor cubes
description: Tor-tor cubes is a puzzle game with a 2D view. The goal of the game is to destroy all the cubes in the level. Many different powerups.

name: Five Nights at Sonic's Collection
description: A collection of all 5 Five Nights at Sonic's games, with the addition of reviews from the developers and an accessible menu.

name: Arcade Archive: Vulcan Venture
description: Battle resumes! Shatter GOFER's ambitions!!

name: Bushi
description: Wield your bow and sword against fierce opponents as you navigate obstacles with dynamic parkour in the samurai-themed arena brawler, Bushi! Inspired by the cult classic GunZ The Duel and The Legend of Son-Goku.

name: Dinosaur Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Unique dinosaur game for children. Perfect for all dinosaur fans.

name: Game Battle Tycoon
description: Battle with in-game games! A new kind of game battle!

name: Cham the Cat Adventure
description: The first in the fictional "GAME BUDDY" portable game series! Dedicated to the game boys and girls of the past. A retro-style action game!

name: Oumuamua
description: The third installment in the fictional "GAME BUDDY" portable game series! Retro-style Breakout clone!

name: Jewelinx
description: The second installment in the fictional "GAME BUDDY" portable game series! A retro-style Falling block puzzle!!

name: Biggerman.io
description: One left-stick rules them ALL! Biggerman - a simple yet satisfying action game for everyone! Smash! Absorb! And Get Bigger!

name: It's on You
description: It's On You is an FMV game in which your choices will affect the outcome of Curtis and those around him. The latter caught between a world of crime and violence, in the wake of a gang taking control of the community and a potential career as an international footballer.

name: StreamFest
description: StreamFest is a game made for streamers. This game offers you direct interaction with your viewers, providing even greater interaction in your live streams. Create rooms, mini games and sweepstakes in this game, you and your viewers will have your own avatars within the game to interact and have fun.

name: Mine Blocks
description:
A 2D sandbox game, originally created as a browser fan-game of Minecraft. By exploring procedurally generated terrain, players obtain the raw resources necessary to build new structures, and to craft tools and items to further progression.

In the survival game mode, one of the player's many possible goals is to safely travel through the portal in the skyhold to conquer the dragon boss fight.
In the creative game mode, all items are immediately accessible so the player can construct without having to worry about dangerous creatures and managing hunger.

name: Minarai Mahoutsukai Fuwaru no Bouken
description: Sin descripción

name: Stötnisse Åker Hiss
description: Stötnisse Åker Hiss is a game based on a Swedish children book character created by Björn Schumacher and Kenneth Andersson. One of his greatest interests is to ride the elevator of his grandmother's apartment building and that is essentially what the game is about.

name: Ninja JaJaMaru-kun: Onigiri Ninpou-chou Gold
description: Ninja JaJaMaru-kun: Onigiri Ninpou-chou Gold is an Action game, developed by Atelier Double and published by Jaleco, which was released in Japan in 1997.

name: Keng's Little Universe
description: The game is divided into three parts, which simulate three stages of civilization respectively. The first is the survival of civilization in a multi-stars system. The second is the expansion and war of civilization in a galaxy. The third part is the exploration of god civilization in the universe.

name: Funny Pets
description: In this cute Match-3 game a terrible tornado carried away all the funny pets! Help them to find the way to their small town Petsville

name: Secrets of the Past: Mother's Diary
description: Exciting hidden object game with many levels and a thrilling story line. Uncover the Secrets of the Past: Mothers Diary!

name: Panzers on the Steppe
description: A fast-paced WWII Eastern Front campaign game that simulates the titanic clashes of armor and armies across the Russian steppe from Finland to the Caucasus mountains. The game does all the logistics so you can focus on strategy and tactics.

name: Project Myriad 2
description: Project Myriad 2 is a tower defense strategy game. Build towers on a grid of hexagons floating in space. 35 levels with unique tiles and mechanics each providing a unique challenge. 3 difficulty levels including extreme mode which has never ending waves of enemies. Strive for your new high score!

name: Ragnar
description: Inspired by old NES games, Ragnar is a 2D run-and-gun action platformer that will be difficulty and fair. We would like to bring back the classic and retro feel to modern platforms and a new generation of gamers.

name: Hot Pickle!
description: Hot Pickle! Is a 2D platform jumping game. Run, jump, shoot, and dash your way through 10 epic food-themed levels.

name: Where's My Horse? An Escape the Room Adventure
description: Experience an at-home Escape Room adventure! Find secrets, solve puzzles, and open locked chests to help you solve the mystery- where did your horse go?

name: Ultra Thunderball
description: Are you ready for the greatest arcade challenge yet? Equip your Gun-Bat and try to defeat the evil geometrics. See you in the tournament!

name: Riddle Girl
description: Any girl is a riddle - solve each one.

name: Project Umbra
description: Project Umbra is a twin sticks shooter game set in a colored voxel world. Travel back in time to destroy enemies and score!

name: The Sheep P
description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Collect wool with the main hero of the game The Sheep P. Collect all wool in the world!

name: Rising Star
description:
Free to play NFT based music career game. Earn crypto and become a megastar!
Start as a lowly busker and work your way to the world tour collecting NFTs and earning crypto along the way. See you in Buskeria!

name: Zwart Wit
description: It looks simple to get to the exit in the first few levels, but it keeps getting harder! If you don't have a good brain and a quick finger then forget about playing this.

name: Battle Brothers: Complete Edition
description: The Battle Brothers: Complete Edition contains the base game and all expansion DLC's! Buy the bundle and save on all items.

name: New
description: New is an Off fangame, acting as a continuation of OFF's events. New is notable for answering major questions posed by Off, as well as reworking the combat system to be more challenging and tactical.

name: Gakuen Handsome: Ikusei Game - Mitsurugi Sakuya no Soccer Sekai ni Hirometai
description: Sin descripción

name: Initializing Maintenance Run: We're Good to Go.
description:
Who've we got on shift today?

Year 3484 aboard The Adamant Gambit.

name: Levitation Simulator
description: Levitation Simulator is a game where you can experience levitation.

name: Henri's Secret 2
description: Henri's Secret 2 is a sequel to 2017's visual novel created by Nineland and developed by Beemoov, where you continue to live the adventures of Lyla, a student who has found love. Mystery and passion await you in this interactive novel! Discover an exciting romance where friendship, humor, passion, and... superstars come together!

name: Uncoven: The Seventh Day
description: Your adventure begins at the doorstep of a house, lost in the middle of the woods, and that is filled with mystery. You join your friends for seven days of vacation and relaxation, but things don't go as planned... Strange phenomena will question your reality and transform you, for better... or worse.

name: Kurayami
description:
Kurayami (meaning "darkness") is a visual novel concentrating on dialogue and decision-making within the confined setting of a broken elevator and developing relationship between the hero and the young woman. Depending on the player's choices, their relationship will evolve in different ways, leading to different endings.

The game contains scenes with nudity and sexual situations.

name: Monsters Domain
description: Defend the Monsters’ Domain. Kill heroes and collect their treasures. Play the Monsters’ side and loot foolish warriors who dare to explore your realm. Build up your forces, upgrade them and equip them with better weapons, skills and tricks to lure and kill even more shiny forces of the light.

name: Evilmun 2
description: Evilmun 2 is the continuation of the successful part of the game and part of the Evilmun trilogy. You play as a mage and a knight in new incomprehensible and unforgettable map locations that you will have to go through using two powers, Mage's powers and Knight's powers!

name: Football Club
description: Football Club - 2D football simulator. The game has titles, awards, points and bonuses, which makes the game more interesting and unique. The game has more than 10 different maps in which we can play 1vs1 against a bot, or a friend, as well as on a local network. In your hands are 3 football players for whom you can manage!

name: Era of War
description:
Have guts? Join and show off your leadership!

Build and upgrade your army to conquer the World

Construct and facilitate your base to fend of raiders.

Forge a mighty Clan with worldwide players.

Lead you Clan to resounding triumph. A great leader always comes up with great strategies!

name: Smart Factory Tycoon
description: Smart Factory Tycoon is a factory management and automatization simulator game about running your dream factory with robots. Design your dream factory, plan all steps of production, research new technologies and become a tycoon!

name: Final Space: The Rescue
description: The Final Space universe has expanded to VR! Join Gary, Avocato, Nightfall, and Tribore as they embark on a brand new journey to rescue their dear friend from the clutches of a new, but familiar, threat. Take on this shooter adventure solo or online with up to 3 friends! Use your arsenal of weapons to reign supreme and show the galaxy who's boss.

name: Castaway
description: Stranded on a mysterious island, it is up to you to restore peace to its villagers. Become a powerful warrior - growing your powers and abilities through over 50 quests across a distinct and visually stylized world. Discover and raise loyal pets that will fight by your side in this unique action RPG. Customize your appearance as you gain new armor and weapons from wooden sticks to elemental swords.

name: Subugs
description: Sin descripción

name: Kurokami-sama's Feast
description: Kurokami-sama's Feast is an adventure visual novel following an unlucky trio who find themselves hunting monsters for the powerful being known as Kurokami-sama.

name: Sunset Spirit Steel
description: Explore a lost mesa filled with memories and singing sculptures.

name: Undercurrent
description: An adventure indie horror game by Dave_ja. Part of the Haunted PS1's Summer Of Shivers Jam.

name: Phil the Pill
description:
Phil The Pill is an immersive, surprising and mildly addicting action puzzle adventure game. Phil the Pill conjures the quality, fun and imagination of classic games like Bomberman, Pacman, Mario and more in a game mechanic designed from the ground up specifically for touch screens!

Swipe, tap, punch, shoot and bomb your way through 96 levels of pure puzzle-action excellence! Players may experience fits of laughter, tears of joy, racing hearts, frustration and above all things, pure fun!

name: Mega Mutant Escape: Hulk Edition
description: During the experimental detonation of a gamma bomb, scientist Bruce Banner rushes to save teenager Rick Jones who has driven onto the testing field; Banner pushes Jones into a trench to save him, but is himself hit with the blast, absorbing massive amounts of gamma radiation. He awakens later in an infirmary, seeming relatively unscathed, but that night transforms into a lumbering gray form that breaks through the wall and escapes.

name: Sea Rovers: MetaPlunder
description:
One of the first ever playable Solana Blockchain NFT games. See your Coves, Captains, and Rovers come to life in our interactive MetaPlunder Beta.

Explore your unique pirate haven, play mini-games, and compete for $RUM on the leaderboards!

name: Kawaii Girls Puzzle
description: Kawaii girls puzzle is a puzzle game, swap blocks to assemble an image.

name: Benjamin Blumchen: Ein Tag im Zoo
description: Benjamin Blümchen: Ein Tag im Zoo is a german only Nintendo DS game

name: Benjamin Blumchen: Torooo im Zoo
description: Benjamin Blumchen: Torooo im Zoo is a German only Nintendo Wii game.

name: Stowaway
description: Stowaway is a pixel style horror shooting game.

name: Vaccine Delivery Adventure
description: Vaccine Delivery Adventure is a classic side-scrolling action game where a healthcare worker has to overcome the challenges of delivering the BCG Vaccine to the communities that need it!

name: Moon Dancer
description: Moon Dancer is a vertically scrolling shmup featuring an exhilarating lock-on laser.

name: Dave Dave Dave
description: Dave Dave Dave, is a retro style hardcore platforming game set in an unknown world for you to explore with a single goal, reaching freedom.

name: Honored
description: Honored is a stealth, action-adventure game where the player uses various gadgets and powers to knock out or kill enemies in order to escape and take down the Egyptian empire.

name: Shores of Loci
description: Escape the Ordinary, Create the Extraordinary. A Puzzling Adventure by MikeTeevee.

name: Bald Luigi's Crustmust Deluxe
description:
Take a look into the history of Ralorche, the creator of Essence Of Waluigi with the definitive way to play his last Joke Game, Bald Luigi's Crustmust.

In Bald Luigi's Crustmust: Christmas has been canceled (for a basically obvious reason) and Santario, the biggest christmas fanboy is livid! He plans to kill literally everyone! As Bald Luigi, it is up to you to stop him, but little do you know that there is something strange going on behind the scenes......

name: Random-Pac
description: RandomPac is a tribute to Pac-Man (Pakkuman), an arcade game released by Namco in 1980.

name: Dig Dug Revival
description:
This game is a homage to Dig Dug, an arcade game developed by Namco in 1982.

In this version, except the first one, the playfields are generated randomly.

name: 1930 Langman Tan
description: 1930 Romance Tan" is a female-oriented mobile game that combines "historical elements" & "original plot". In the game, the player will play the role of a college student who has accidentally traveled to 1930s Taipei city. In order to return home, the player must assist an amnesiac book spirit to retrieve memories until they can recall the coordinates to return home.

name: Sunrise: The Game
description:
In Sunrise the player controls Rydec who is working on a teleportation experiment with his friends Brian and Max. Unfortunately the experiment goes wrong and suddenly New York is deserted and the sun fails to rise. And then there is that unconscious woman lying in front of the house door...

In many ways Sunrise: The Game tries to bring innovations to the adventure genre. Despite the puzzles are item based the game features no classic inventory system: Rydec won't take an item until it is directly needed for the next puzzle. If he has all items needed he uses them himself. The only things he always carry is a multi tool with three functions, e.g. as screwdriver and a PDA which shows the next task and optionally gives hints. Another help function is the possibility to mark all hot spots on the screen. The puzzles itself often feature multiple solutions. Another speciality is that all the conversations are automatic. Despite the dark scenario the dialogues are also humorous and long - if the player doesn't like listening to them he can use an option to shorten them.

name: Tadpole Tap
description:
Reach the skies with your favorite tadpole while eating flies with your tongue!
With piranhas constantly on your tail, you must hurry and pull your way through dangerous obstacles!

name: Scare Crow
description: Sin descripción

name: Omega
description: Omega is a traditional roguelike set in a fantasy open-world environment. It features turn-based movement, procedural generation, permadeath, and multiple victory conditions.

name: Jigsaw Fun: Greatest Cities
description: Solve 100 jigsaw puzzles of Greatest Cities. Puzzle solo or together in multiplayer for up to 4 players!

name: Moorhuhn Jump and Run: Traps and Treasures
description: Moorhuhn 'Traps and Treasures' for Nintendo Switch brings 21 challenging levels + 6 bonus levels full of dangerous traps, devious enemies and hidden treasures!

name: Pure Chase 80's
description: One of the most exciting Nintendo Switch chase games! PC80's is pure arcade, pure speed, pure adrenaline. Frantic driving, with no time to even blink.

name: Jigsaw Master Kids
description: Jigsaw puzzle for kids in "Jigsaw Masterpieces" series !

name: Forever Skies
description: Forever Skies is a first-person action survival game. Return to Earth destroyed by an ecological disaster, fly a high-tech airship, expand, rebuild and repair it. Scavenge resources to survive, face the dangers of the surface as you will hunt for viral pathogens to cure a mysterious illness.

name: Geography Quiz Festival: Guess the Countries
description: Advance through our beloved game by completing the different missions you find on your way. Prove that you know the most about Geography!

name: Castle Escape
description: 'Castle Escape' is a 2D action Metroidvania with a brutal combat system. Discover the dark secrets, find treasures, and explore dangerous dungeons. Fight your way through the cursed castle, find treasures, upgrade skills, execute the damned souls and unravel the mystery of this once mighty castle.

name: Rogue Command
description: Classic RTS gameplay fused with a modern roguelike. Shape your build each run by assembling an evolving arsenal of powerful units and facilities. Harvest resources, build out your base. Raise your army and call down orbital strikes to overcome the forces threatening your survival.

name: Fluctuoid
description:
Fluctuoid (noun.) a thing that changes size
- Shrink and grow to make your way through the maze
- Puzzle platforming that emphasises flow, discovery and a unique, laid back experience

name: Track Mayhem
description:
Hop into a space ship and race on a reflex testing obstacle course in an intense, adrenaline pumping flying action.
Track Mayhem is an infinite flyer that puts you in a seat of a quantum levitating spacecraft flying at incredible speeds through a challenging obstacle track in space.

name: eBaseball Pawafuru Puroyakyu 2022
description: This title is the largest volume in the history of the series! The classic modes from the previous titles, such as Success, Power Fest, Crown Nine, Pennant, and My Life, have been revamped and upgraded, and a new online battle mode called Power Park has been created where you can play with your own original players!

name: Retrievable
description:
Retrievable is an exploration game with the focus on relaxation.
You can explore different levels within which nothing can kill you.

Explore different levels, about 5 hours of gameplay.
Mini-story: An important emerald was stolen and has to be retrieved.
Re-play value: Some game elements, like items, are randomly placed in the level. So each new game is different.

name: Traitor: Feducall
description: Traitor - A big story game in the Traitor laboratory where we have to escape. The game Feducall shows the main mechanics of the game, and also helps the creators to collect their levels and pass them. Over 100 unique levels.

name: Far Cry 6: Deluxe Edition
description:
Welcome to Yara, a tropical paradise frozen in time. Far Cry 6 thrusts players into a modern-day guerrilla revolution. Become a guerrilla fighter and burn ruthless dictator Antón Castillo's regime to the ground.

The Deluxe Edition includes:
- the base game
- the Ultimate Pack, a compilation featuring three in-game content packs:
- the Jungle Expedition Pack
- the Croc Hunter Pack
- the Vice Pack

name: Riders Republic: Deluxe Edition
description:
This edition includes the game and Ultimate Pack, which contains the Cosmic Pack, Neon Pack, Rainbow Pack, Skull'n Style Pack, and 20 Helicopter Tickets.

Grab your bike, skis, snowboard, or wingsuit and explore an open world sports paradise where the rules are yours to make - or break.

name: Bus Driver Simulator: Countryside
description: Bus driving simulation game in which players must complete journeys around the city of Murom and its suburbs according to a schedule.

name: Serious Sam: Siberian Mayhem
description: Serious Sam: Siberian Mayhem is a new stand-alone expansion to the world of the classic FPS series. Join the fight against Notorious Mental on a journey through the wild lands of Russia, and find your way through this lost chapter of Sam Stone's adventures.

name: Contact
description: Contact is a horror point and click adventure game. In a bizarre world where you are trapped in an accident, you must investigate and find the whereabouts of your family. You have to run away from the creatures that attack you and collect items to overcome obstacles.

name: Is This True?! My Cute Kouhai is in Love With Me!
description:
The protagonist, who is nicknamed "Senpai," is greeted by his Kouhai named Satou Kaori one day. They spent that whole day together.
Kaori had something she wanted to tell only her senpai, though. Whether Kaori confesses or not depends on the choice her senpai makes.

name: Ronin: Tales of a Ghost
description:
Ronin: Tales of a Ghost takes you on an endless adventure through a stunningly beautiful world.

Play as Ghost - a skilled Ronin - set on clearing ancient Japan of all the dangerous and and mysterious creatures inhabiting it.

Conquer all in your way as you cross perilous bridges, jump large chasms and across mysterious floating rocks.

Visit the shop and your companion at your camp for upgrades and customisation.

A satisfying and fast paced combat system with multiple enemy types each with varied attacks ranging from projectiles to melee.

Unlock a variety of weapons ranging from Katana's to Tridents, find the weapon to suit your style. Weapons can be bought from the shopkeeper Senshi, who can be found in your camp.

name: Warframe: The New War
description:
Experience The New War, Warframe's largest cinematic expansion yet. Fight on the frontlines in every corner of the Origin System in a thrilling storyline of exploration and discovery. Unite opposing forces and test your mettle against the full mustered force of the Sentients, a legion of adaptable, self-replicating drones capable of untold destruction. You must stop them, Tenno, and reckon with the Lotus, or all you have fought to protect will fall to ruin.

With several new playable characters, a new Warframe, a dramatic cinematic Quest, and an Arsenal reinforced with new Customizations, Weapons and Accessories, get ready to wield limitless power to look and play the way you want in this all-out-war.

name: Lisa: The Doleful
description:
Long after the events of the White Flash ravaged Olathe, one man stands against a tide of Blood

Based in the setting established by Lisa the Painful creator Dingaling

name: Mysteries of Darkness
description:
A roguelike single-player card game where you battle fierce creatures in turn-based combat.
Win battles to improve your cards, and build a powerful deck capable of defeating the demon that opened the portal to hell.

name: Post fur Ritter Rost
description: Post für Ritter Rost is a puzzle game for children aged 6 to 10 based on the German Ritter Rost franchise of children's books with a musical audio disc included.

name: LEGO Ninjago: Spinjitzu Scavenger Hunt
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Ninjago: Rise of the snakes
description: sequel of Lego Ninjago: Spinjitzu Scavenger Hunt

name: Emeritus Pong
description:
Emeritus Pong is a clone of the good old "Pong" game. It tries to be relatively close to the original, therefore no fancy graphic or astonishing sound effects there. Emeritus Pong is written to be able to run on any modern PC. There are three versions available: DOS, Windows and Linux. Emeritus Pong features also a cool demo mode, which makes it playing against itself, displaying the current time as scores.

The game is programmed to run flawlessly on any modern PC, but it will run on older architectures, too. A 90 MHz Pentium CPU and 2 Mb of RAM should be enough to run comfortably the DOS version. Emeritus Pong may run in any usual resolution, ranging from 320x240 to 1280x1024, fullscreen or windowed. If you would like to use any other video mode (not available from the game's setup), you will have to manually edit the empong.cfg configuration file.

Windows and Linux versions require a sound card for sound, and DOS version simply uses the internal PC Speaker.

name: Wicked Rider
description: Wicked rider is a retro motorcycle racing game, with a similar style to 'outrun', 'lotus' and 'crazy cars' series in Amiga/DOS. There are 15 tracks, betting rivals and upgrades. Well, that's pretty much it.

name: Dragon Age Legends: Remix 01
description:
Dragon Age Legends Remix 01 is a "remix" of Dragon Age Legends. It features the same graphics as the aforementioned game, but completely different gameplay. Where the original game was a turn-based RPG on social networks, the remix is an action-based hack and slash game.

The player controls the main character through a side-scrolling environment using only the mouse. The player can use mouse gestures to perform special combos, which are required to kill the many monsters that will appear from both in front of and behind the character. Killing enemies unlocks experience points which can be used to upgrade stats such as health and stamina when the player reaches a campsite.

name: Creep: The Last Tube
description:
This was a previously lost 3D Shockwave horror game from 2005.
It was created by the company "JailDog" and was made to promote the 2004 horror film "Creep".

name: Dragon Knight
description: Dragon Knight is a innovative player-oriented NFT MMORPG on the Binance Smart Chain with a player-owned, blockchain backed economy, an exciting combat system with PvP and PvE battles and scarce tradeable NFT collectibles.

name: Cat Town
description: Become a leader who leads the cat herd, build your base, upgrade your buildings, resist bad weather, cultivate better offspring, resist the plunder of wild animals, lie down and roll the cat in a relaxed atmosphere, or become a person to enjoy the scenery

name: Innocent Passage
description: Use real-world shipping data to visualise a future maritime conflict.

name: FitStrike
description: The next generation of VR workouts.

name: Worland: Dungeons
description: Worland is an adventure game, where you can build your own base, and clear dungeons.

name: Coloring Pixels: Isometric 2
description: This Isometric 2 themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! The second book of it's kind offers various images and scenes all designed in the isometric perspective!Isometric is back by popular demand!

name: Aery: Dreamscape
description: In Aery - Dreamscape you play as a bird like spirit who can enter the minds of other people in order to explore their thoughts, their secrets and their imagination. Experience the feeling of flying, immerse into beautiful and atmospheric landscapes and enjoy the unique storytelling of the game... ​

name: Shooter's Island
description: Shooter’s Island is an aim trainer with VR support, built for FPS pros and beginners alike. On an expansive, remote island, several trials await you that train your reflexes and precision. Analyze your shooting skills on your personal low-poly testing island!

name: Wild West
description: WILD WEST - is a hardcore 3D shooter with survival elements where you will have to fight various enemies playing as a sheriff James.

name: Yeolleb Warrior
description: Yeolleb Warrior is a action-adventure game with a cartoon animation style.

name: Comixxx Desires
description: Comixxx Desires is a casual game with relaxing atmosphere featuring high quality, hot & sexy girls done in comic book style. Put your logic to the test to solve the puzzle and reveal the girls!

name: Sandboxels
description: Sandboxels is an in-browser falling sand simulation game, with mechanics such as heat simulation, electricity, density, chemical reactions, fire, and over 500 unique elements to play with.

name: Bo's Adventure: Merging Islands
description: An 8-bit Casual Story game The 1st game of Bo's Adventure Franchise.

name: Bok
description: BOK is a 2D Indie-Platformer with a cartoony and fun aesthetic, that may possibly be overrun with difficulty and rage. It may prove to be quite the adventure, with many struggles and broken monitors along the way, so have fun with the game while you still have the chance. Good Luck!

name: Bitch Government
description: A princess who abusing her body for diplomacy. But she is getting accustom to sexual excitement, and her important part and thought are getting bad.

name: How Fish Is Made
description: Are sardines trustworthy? Are you? Do you want to be? How Fish is Made is a janky little jaunt through the world of surrealist storytelling.

name: Mahou Shoujo Desu ga, Dungeon de Mugen ni Tsuyoku Natte mo Ii Desu ka
description: レトロゲーム風ダンジョン探索J-RPG！✨魔法を選んで敵を攻撃するフル音声ターン制バトル！✨フルボイスのストーリー✨無量大数を超えて強くなる魔法少女えりかの冒険！✨強大な敵を倒してダンジョンの深層まで辿り着けるか✨

name: Thirty Eternal Days
description: Touch the world after the Catastrophe. Remember your life, which has become almost endless. Repent of your past and try to save the future in this sci-fi text-based interactive adventure game.

name: Two World Portal
description: Travel to a mysterious world and solve the series of puzzles to activate the ancient portal.

name: Bomb! Bomb! Carnival!!
description: Third-person sports bombing, where you compete with other players using a variety of bombs.

name: Snowyland
description: Snowyland is a pixel art platformer where the player must eat to survive on an empty, barren island. You should freeze family members to create ice platforms that help you reach your dinner. Choose where this ice platforms are placed, and create solutions that even the developers have not seen yet!

name: Surrounded
description: Surrounded is an up to 6-player cooperative horror game where you will encounter a lot of different variations of paranormal activities, strange sightings, and creatures capable of ending your life. Grab your gear, and be ready to experience the strange mystery of the Surrounded world.

name: Kyo: Gigantify
description: You Grow Big, and Create Your Path to the Exit! That's It. This a a short game by the way.

name: Specwar Tactics
description: Specwar Tactics is a simple game that lets you build up your ideal special operations team and command them in battle. Manage your facilities and troop roster, and lead them on missions, utilizing stealth, fire and maneuver, and CQB to overcome greater numbers with superior tactics.

name: Sex Dating Trip
description: You want to have sex with every woman you meet? That doesn't have to be a dream!In this game you go on an sex dating trip!In the beginning you meet your girlfriend for a casual date, but it turns into a sex date. After that, you can find another girlfriend to sex date right away!

name: Electric
description: Feel like an electrician in a fun logic puzzle game with a view from above - the Electric game.

name: Em
description: EM is a fast-paced, hard hitting 3D fighter featuring Electro-Magnetic combat. To win the war against the machines, you as an elite fighter will go fist to fist on a mission to annihilate them all!

name: Last Sinner
description: Last Sinner is a Top Down Shooter with elements of a Royal Battle.

name: Thumb-Thump
description: TT is for your THUMBS When a scene begins, a song will be played. If YOU can match the right keys at the right moment, your SKILL improves and the flowers turn green.

name: Pocket Rocket
description: Pocket Rocket is a minimalistic arcade racing game where you try to get the fastest time possible by maneuvering through tough hand-crafted levels.

name: Circo: Dark Story
description: Circo:Dark Story is a pixel action RPG game.Your goal - discover your past in the Kingdom Ruins and defeat the Emperor of Darkness!

name: It follows you
description: You are all alone in this dark and frightening place. Run and hide, hurry to find a way out, because it follows you...

name: Bleu
description: Sonia was a brilliant young artist with a promising future... But she was murdered last night in her own home. Become the detective, take on the case and figure out who killed her in this unique detective adventure.

name: Nervous Granny
description: Nervous Granny is a 2d platformer in which we control Granny, who, with the help of her cane, deals with evil robbers who are encroaching on her rest and purse, jump on platforms, collect bonuses and use them to buy various improvements for further progress.

name: Archipelago
description: Archipelago is a roguelike tower defense game about defending randomly generated islands. Setup your defenses, manage your income, and find powerful charms to repel the enemy. Archipelago introduces tension and strategy to the tower defense genre.

name: Polygunners
description: Polygunners is a cross between a twin-stick shooter and an RPG. Upgrade abilities, explore dungeons and towns, and fight bosses to progress through the world. Playing with your friends with local co-op cranks the experience up to 11 for satisfying dynamic gameplay.

name: Goat's Tale Plus
description: The treasures hidden on the tops of the four lands await the most lively goat daredevils. The challenge will be difficult and… irritating - only the best and most patient will get to the top.

name: Race! Beauty! Bugs!
description: In "Race! Beauty! Bugs!" you have to pave the way through the godforsaken places of the world. At your disposal will be machines of all classes that only man created.

name: Remembrance
description: A story-driven experience about a painter who lost her memory and wants to get it back... or at least, she thinks she does.

name: Arpsic
description: Arpsic is a casual musical rhythm game. With Arpsic, you can train yourself with intuitive lessons, learn the treble clef, bass clef, and more!

name: Galactic Ravager
description: The planet earth was attacked by aliens. Only you, the captain of the aerospace forces, can save the planet from enemies. You have to protect the orbital station, as well as penetrate behind enemy lines and destroy all the aliens.

name: Child vs. Clowns
description: Child vs Clowns - Top Down View with elements of the Bomberman game.

name: Bomb Sweeper VR
description: Don't get stuck in your old minesweeper style games with just a basic grid. Challenge yourself on a virtual reality version set on a variety of islands in all shapes and sizes.

name: Boat Simulator Apprentice
description: Welcome to the simulator-arcade experience. Boat Simulator Apprentice is a small boat training game that caters to both simulator fans and arcade game lovers. Learn how to drive a motorboat via structured lessons, participate in rescue missions, time trials, treasure hunts, and boat sprints.

name: Jingor Mine
description: Rule: In the jingor face, click the left mouse button to open the grid in sweeper mode, and to mark mines when switching to mine marking mode. Of particular interest is the mines on the other side of an edge in the jingor face.

name: SuchInheritance
description: As for unknown treasures, people always hold the idea that the seer has a share, but they don't know that some treasures may be easy to see, but they have to risk their lives to take them.

name: Drop one NPC to another
description: This is a 2D ACT Game, and a fitness game. your target is use yourself to collide or drag one NPC to let it collide to another NPC, and it also has leisure time to let you follow our character to play jump rope or boxing and so on to fit your body.

name: Anchor Club
description: Anchor is a form of creative writing of textual interaction of origin, using the function of dice, in which a random number of prepared options determine the development of the story (the dice have a will of their own).

name: Isekai Succubus: My Genderbent Saga in Another World
description: An isekai 3D dungeon crawler RPG following the story of a genderbent protagonist and cute succubus girls! After awakening in an unfamiliar world, the protagonist finds that he has changed genders and become a succubus. Will he be able to overcome the hardships and return to his original world?

name: Mental Math Tutor
description: Mental Math Tutor is a fun flash card game for learning, become the KING of PE(MD)(AS) and show your math teachers who's boss!

name: Dogs and Pigs
description: “Dogs and pigs” is a word that immediately shows how Korean game companies treat their customers. You decide to hack into the computer of the famous gaming company NNN for revenge. You decide to go directly to the company and plug in the USB containing the virus for the most reliable hacking.

name: Ibatic
description: Ibatic is a fast-paced platformer in which you evolve in a fantastic world. Beat the fastest time in each level by sliding, jumping and dashing through various deadly environments using the power of your staff.

name: Back and Back to Hell
description: BACK and BACK to Hell is a Top Down shooter in which you will have to fight waves of demons that endlessly make their raids on the main character, hoping to finish an absolutely crushing preemptive strike on their ranks.

name: Golden Mine Pickaxe
description: You are a brave digger who went in search of minerals! Alone, you have to find as many of them as possible and improve your outfit in order to move further and further each time.

name: Mage Tower
description: Forge your own adventure in Mage Tower! Explore the land of Aikala, embark on an epic adventure in this strategy action game.

name: Dog Adventure
description: Dog Adventure is an incredibly challenging side-scrolling game. If you like challenging platformers, then this game is definitely for you. In this game you play as a funny dog ​​that needs to get into its house. Complete all the hardest levels of this game with funny music!

name: Nevedomo
description: Nevedomo is a dynamic arena first-person shooter with a Zetlex robot. Future. Two warring factions Rockets and Bullets participate in deadly competitions under the leadership of the Texer Force Corporation in order to capture the world's resources. Have a good fight!

name: The Immaculate Drag
description: A small game about letting go. Stay up late. Smoke cigarettes. Talk to strangers. Think about what you've lost. Someone you used to love? Or someone you used to be?

name: Unreal Element World
description: Unreal Element World is a Roguelike overlook game;

name: Colony Simulator
description: Can your Colony survive 10 days or more in the desert? Find food, build your colony, recruit new workers, feed your population, craft tools and equipment, cook food and research technologies!

name: One Way
description: One Way is a 3D platformer with various puzzles, traps and obstacles.

name: Spellcaster
description: Spellcaster is a top-down, shoot 'em up, tower defence action game. You control an old wizard who has to defend his home from hordes of monsters. Powerful spells and bullets will help you in this task. A warm, atmospheric fantasy game.

name: Miss Agatha's Palace
description: Save the princesses, save the world! The legendary girls of Miss Agatha's Palace have been abducted. It's up to you and your friends to rescue them and stop global destruction. Make big choices and wind up with the woman of your dreams, plus a few others on the side.

name: Chilli Con Valley
description: Chilli con Valley! Help the Bean reach its chilli con Carne pot as fast as possible. Jump over Obstacles and dangerous objects just like lava and knives. Who doesn't want to help a poor little bean? Chilli con valley is a game for people with a lot of persistence and a mentally strong head.

name: Psychic
description: You are a psychic named Marilyn.The police contacted you to help find the missing girl.You are the only one who can help them.

name: Alchemist of War
description: Alchemist of War is a casual card game with crafting elements. Play as the alchemist merchant. Craft weapons using random ingredients. Your customers are from both sides of a war. But you don't have any favorites! As long as they keep paying. And if the fight goes on longer, maybe you can sell more.

name: Follow the Black Kitten
description: You buy a laptop with your hands. You find an interactive collection of short stories on your laptop and something else. Or someone? What will all this lead to?

name: Avocado Love
description: Avocado Love is a colorful and enjoyable platformer with a side view. Pirates have kidnapped the soul mate of our hero Avocado, help him save her and reunite again.

name: 100 Hidden Fish
description: The fish hid. Try to find them all! A very large location.

name: Argonauts Agency: Missing Daughter
description: The Argonauts Agency – Find out how the family turmoil of the gods has affected common mortals and how it all ends!

name: Operation Sexy Sudoku
description: Solve puzzles to release two dimensional girls from their misty curse. Gather your team of mental gymnasts to aid you on your quest. Unlimited variations of sudoku puzzles.

name: Harlem Blade: The Greatest of All Time
description:
Cain is a perverted young boy who is supposed to be a warrior. His ancestors killed an evil demon called Gargantuan. Cain's brother, Abel, wants him to take his role as a warrior seriously, but Cain is more interested in ogling the village ladies.

Things take a different turn when Abel disappears and Cain is visited in his dreams by The Goddess of Time. She tells Cain that Gargantuan has come back and that it's up to him to stop it. What follows as a very long journey for Cain to save the world from Gargantuan and develop a harem of beautiful women, though not necessarily in that order.

name: Disney's Magical Quest Starring Mickey & Minnie
description: Disney's Magical Quest Starring Mickey & Minnie is a GBA remake of the SNES game The Magical Quest Starring Mickey Mouse. In this version Minnie Mouse is added to the game as a playable character, as well as four mini-games for both single-player and multiplayer. The remake also introduces a save feature.

name: Party, Darling?
description: A weird & abrasive sci-fi mystery narrative adventure game.

name: The Paint Gunner
description: Everybody in your factory is trapped inside the party room. It is up to you to save them all - by using your super cool paint gun of course!

name: I'm going to die if I don't eat sushi!
description:
A casual free action game based on Japan's world-class sushi.
If you don't keep eating sushi, you will die.

name: ZJ the Ball Challenge: Level 5C
description: Sin descripción

name: 100 Hidden Dogs
description: Hidden object game in the alien setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. A large location and cute dogs.

name: Project: Summer Ice - Bowling: Story One - Pammy Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Finger Fitness
description: Sin descripción

name: Debugger 4406
description: Deck-building cyberpunk adventure game

name: Aventia
description: Fast paced card combat and deckbuilding meets a story-driven campaign

name: Arcadebnb
description: Get carried away by the real estate fever in an arcade way.

name: Troubled Waters
description: A top-down 2D ship combat adventure with active crew management

name: Christmas Morning
description: Sin descripción

name: Two Handed Mage
description: Deck-building roguelike shooter!

name: Uda Game
description: Explore the unknown dungeons full of treasure, doors and rooms. But keep in mind the creatures guards this place.

name: Tuggowar
description: Tuggowar is a pure deckbuilding game with strategy elements inspired by RTS. Discover new strategies and combos to find the best build each time! Disrupt the enemy's gameplan, or Tank-rush to catch them off guard. Climb the ranks in PvP or chill vs AI.

name: Monster Path
description: A deck building roguelike-JRPG with a 2.5D storybook fantasy art style accompanied by a dynamic score

name: Godmorgon: Spooky Ride
description: Sin descripción

name: Curse of the Spookz: Hidden Island
description: PG Spooky Pirate Island Adventure!

name: Zoo's Mad
description: Deck Building / Roguelite / Systemic Card Game

name: Space Crafter
description: A game about crafting ships to fight the aliens.

name: Slay the Space
description: Slay The Spire Like Deck-building game

name: The Dark Throne
description: A roguelite deck building card game with a grimy sci-fi setting

name: Kick Your Astronaut
description: Couch Multiplayer Mayhem!

name: Cattenburg
description: Lead a party of cats on adventures in a beautifully illustrated and original card combat game.

name: Sound Voltex: Exceed Gear Konaste
description:
The cloud-based home release of the arcade series beatmania IIDX, released as part of Konami's Konaste line.

The successor to the original home release, Sound Voltex III Gravity Wars: e-amusement cloud, packed full of improvements to the entire experience.

name: Inverted
description: A co-op platforming experience designed for two players. Are you ready to defy gravity?

name: Infinitree
description: A relaxing game in which you play as a leaf falling down an infinitely tall tree.

name: ForceBerg
description: Can a can? No, can can not can!

name: These are not Heroes
description: These are not Heroes is a shmup + deckbuilder with 4 unique heroes and 146 cards to collect. It's in development, so your feedback on bugs and balance is greatly appreciated!

name: Komeiji Satori no Jousou Kyouiku
description: A doujin action puzzle game by Twilight Frontier based on the Touhou Project series.

name: College Bound
description: After two years of working your butt off in college, you and your girlfriend Summer finally managed to qualify for an international student exchange program in sweet, sweet Paris. Sounds nice, doesn’t it? Well, maybe if the principal didn’t suddenly exclude you from the program completely.

name: Football Battle
description: Enter a match, defeat your opponent and claim your trophies! Climb the divisions, collect powerups and dominate the field.

name: Pocket Soccer
description: Pocket Soccer lets you experience the beauty of football on your console, in high quality, and with great cartoon graphics.

name: Junior League: Sports - Soccer
description: Take control of your team and battle against your opposition in some of the wackiest games of 5-a-side action ever!

name: Warno
description: Realistic, immersive, breathtaking. Warno is the ultimate World War III battle simulator. A Cold War turns decisively hot as you command hundreds of units on a beautiful and brutal battlefield. Outsmart, outfight, and lead your forces to total victory.

name: The Witcher: Crimson Trail
description: Geralt, a promising young student, has just completed his training to become an elite monster slayer - a witcher. He has survived arduous tests and intense physical conditioning to become something more than human. Coupled with the esoteric knowledge passed on from veteran witchers, his training has prepared Geralt for whatever evil lurks out in the real world - and has given him the tools to eliminate it. Rumors from local villagers lead him to a dark and twisted forest where a fearsome beast is said to prey on the innocent. Yet as he delves deeper, Geralt soon finds out that a much more insidious evil has taken root in the land, and stopping it will require all of his skill and cunning. Not only will he have to fight his way through legions of monsters across various landscapes, but the decisions he makes along the way will mean the difference between ultimate victory and crushing defeat. Become Geralt, the young witcher, as he sets out on his first adventure - and his final test.

name: Asteroids
description:
If you want to experience the same fun that the kids from 1979 were having while playing the Asteroids game, then you can download the same game ported to Windows by a developer called PJ Crossley. The game is around 2 MB in size and works on all versions of Windows. You can just double-click on the asteroids.exe file to launch the game.

The game can be controlled using the arrow keys to maneuver the spaceship and space bar to fire at the asteroids. As you hit any asteroid, it splits into multiple smaller asteroids. You can shoot these smaller asteroids as well and they will further divide into even smaller ones. Another thing that you will notice that the smaller asteroids move faster and are harder to target.

name: Ancient Gladiators
description: Play alone or with your friends in a gladiators game. This is a single player and multiplayer game, in which you are a gladiator, you can fight however you want. You define how you want to fight against your opponent. The game is very simple, there is solo and team deathmatch with perma death in just one arena, the team or (solo player that survives) is victorious.

name: Anxiety Treatment with Relaxation
description: Dr. Lora Heugens talks about anxiety, how to calm down and feel good about yourself. She talks about common scenarios that normally makes people anxious and goes into details to react to them. She describes the process that will enable you to calm yourself quickly and efficiently anytime.

name: Killer Worm 2
description: Is basic a classic "Snake" in reverse! You are a gladiator in an arena to die with a giant worm chasing you that grows as you get points. Run, dodge, collect points, power-ups and make combos to get the highest score while staying alive.

name: Space Hopper
description: Space hopper is a charming gravity puzzle game with a touching narrative

name: Trigger Dungeon
description: Rage inducing trap-filled precision platformer ideal for speedrunners and masochists alike. Navigate through nearly 200 hundred rooms filled with devious tricks and traps. Classic, easy to pick-up gameplay with colourful pixel art graphics.

name: Hop Skip and Thump
description: Turn-based strategy game. You play as Hop against Skip. Jump around the board and outscore Skip to win. Dodge playful Thump sprites chasing you and blocking your moves. Outsmart Skip on an ever-changing board. Super charming and relaxing, but deceptively tricky with lots of hidden strategies.

name: Ever Seen a Cat?
description: Hidden object game. Find cats in several stylish environments! Every play through is different!

name: Aberration
description: Aberration, a point & click thriller experience that will lead you down a rabbit hole of suspense, fear and misdirection. Roam through the creaking halls of an abandoned mansion, with secrets buried in the walls. Trudge through a muddied farm property and find what's hidden amongst the hay.

name: The Zombie Smasher
description: Get behind the wheel and crush all zombies to the last!

name: Run Run Piñata
description: Play as the Piñata and beat the highest scores by collecting verity of candies, dashing through the barrels and avoid obstacles.

name: Yacht Dice: Global League
description: "The dice is cast." The league match begins in the legendary board game.

name: Win by Definition
description:
"Win by Definition" is a one-player card game adventure. Run the card which has the effect "win" below, or that's all.
You will be born as a role of a subspace in a world where nothing should have existed
and explore for what you are.

name: War and Empires
description: War and Empires is a war strategy game set in the Middle Ages. It tells a story about the ferocious barbarians continued to expand into the empire's territory and occupied the holy city symbolizing imperial power in the dark ages!

name: Gravity Game
description: A physics based, multiplayer melee shooter. Based on the classic game of sumo, your goal is to claim the ring in the middle. Use grenades, rockets and explosive melee weapons to push your opponents off the stage.

name: Puck Bash
description: Experience the frenzy of Air Hockey pushed to its extremes as the puck reaches lighting speeds.

name: Trance
description: A short and simple 2D side-scrolling adventure platformer featuring an unlikely pixel graphic style in different worlds. Challenge and test your abilities with the game's extreme difficulty.

name: Trials of Midnight
description: Recruit nightmare minions to battle your way out of a child's dreamland!

name: Jump Us
description:
Have you ever wondered where the crew members expelled from the ship go.
The answer is, they have to compete for their survival, in a series of minigames, where they have to get 100 points for each game, jump, skate and fly.

name: 3D MiniGolf Remastered
description: Sin descripción

name: Card Adventure
description: Explore a uniquely generated world, fight monsters with cards and build up a kingdom.

name: The Gristmill
description: Tactical Deckbuilding Strategy

name: Strewn Runes
description: Build a deck to defeat arcane abominations in this card-based battler

name: 20 Bunnies
description: Find those hidden bunnies! Enter a world of simple pleasures and minimalistic design, where your only goal is to navigate cleverly arranged stages, avoid spikes and locate beautiful rabbit-eared companions hidden in the environment. But beware of hazards! Lose three hearts, and you’ll instantly respawn at the beginning, with your bunny counter reset to zero. You’ll need to find them all without dying in order to proceed to the next stage and unlock an adorable image for each one you complete.

name: The 9th Annual Vanilla Level Design Contest: Collaboration Hack
description: The 9th Annual Vanilla Level Design Contest Collab Hack of 2016 features 108 contest submissions, along with various staff, judge, and post-game levels. There are a total of 152 exits spread across 117 levels.

name: Puzzle Frenzy
description:
Puzzle Frenzy is a compilation game where you play 6 different casual puzzle games.
*Color Connect
*Pipes
*Word Connect
*Block Escape
*Luminous Loops
*Move the Ball

name: Frigore
description: Frigore is a simple classic first-person indie survival horror game, made entirely by one person. Simple gameplay, beautiful graphics and a cold and chilling atmosphere.

name: Cat Swap Tiles
description: Help a little but brave kitten - to find his friend on an extraordinary journey through some stunning, yet dangerous and challenging places, all gathered in this relaxing swapping puzzle game. No score, no timer and no pressure.

name: Double Time
description: Double Time is a very fun and dynamic game. With more time. there are more chances!

name: Asgard
description: Live and adventure in a world of swords and sorcery in the MMORPG Asgard. Travel the world with many comrades online, learning skills in the far reaches of the world to aid you in your quest.

name: Alina of the Arena
description: A roguelite deckbuilding tactics game that combines elements from 'Slay the Spire' and 'Into the Breach'. Play as a gladiator to survive. With roguelite deckbuilding and hex-based tactics, no longer bound by simple attack and defense. Make use of dodges and knockbacks to stay alive!

name: Zombie Vampires
description: Help Argyle Van Helsing hunt down and destroy Dracula before he turns all the worlds vampires into Zombie Vampires. This creature feature Metroidvania adventure game is filled with classic monsters, wicked levels, and clever humor.

name: Ubiquatopia
description: Card-based strategy game.

name: Gravitum
description: Game in an atomic universe based on gravity.

name: Solarpunk: Failed States
description: Reverse global warming while stopping starvation and civil war

name: Conquer or Die
description: Roguelike deckbuilding dungeon crawler.

name: Tilt'N'Turn
description: A game about puzzles and physics

name: GraviTV
description: A platformer where you can control gravity

name: Freeze the Core
description: A cross-sectional geological jumper

name: Gravitation
description: A planet pulling puzzle game

name: Take Me to the Moon
description: Sin descripción

name: Jivana
description: Jivana is a story-driven adventure game. Embody Aelis, a water priestess who uses her powers to open the path for her community, forced to flee after the appearance of a huge cataclysm. Explore the enchanting landscapes of Jivana, use your ability to manipulate water and lead your people to safety.

name: Football Cup 2022
description: Live and breathe the beautiful game recreated with unparalleled realism of futbol! Choose one of the favorites such as Argentina, Spain or Brazil, or help one of the outsiders achieve the first place. Train, develop yourself, come to the field, and be a soccer star! Once you try to play these soccer games 2022and you won’t stop, it’s all because of the real football game feeling. You will find not only classic soccer game but also many other futbol modes.

name: Miner Ultra Adventures 2
description: Our friend Miner is back!!! Amazing adventures with extreme difficulty, this 3d platform game will surprise you and give you a lot of satisfaction to overcome all the challenges!!! Be versatile and have quick reflexes to be the best!!!

name: Live Adventure
description: Throw yourself into an exciting adventure! Live Adventure is a 2nd person game where you follow the journey of two young explorers, Lence and Reel in search of their parents. Solve the mysteries of a lost civilization while exploring a lush forest littered with mysterious ruins.

name: Master Lander
description: Master Lander is a hard-to-beat 2d physics driven landing game with a centric gravity. You take on a role of remote lander pilot. Your task is to bring the lander from the orbit down to the surface of each of 27 different exoplanets. In order to achieve high score award you need to hover close to alien artifacts scattered on the planets before landing precisely in designated zone. By controlling the thrust of two rocket engines you need to adjust your velocity in order to descend from the orbit and land softly on the landing pad. Watch your fuel, altitude and attitude to land like a pro!

name: Monkey Time
description: Monkey Time is an 8-bit platformer about a Monkey going on an adventure to collect Bananas! There is a timer for speedrunning, try to get the fastest time!

name: Super Girl
description: A simple game. Collect coins, defeat monsters and get the best high score you can in this endless sidescroller.

name: Ballistic
description: Ballistic (also known as Puzz Loop) is a tile-matching arcade puzzle game.

name: Ballistic
description: Ballistic is a tile-matching arcade puzzle game.

name: Crossroads: On a Just Path - Collector's Edition
description: Good drinks, better conversation...

name: Christmas Panic
description: Christmas Panic is a Christmas, trash arena shooter where you have to face alone, a crowd of elf slaves working in a factory for the production of sex toys.

name: NASCAR Heat 5: Ultimate Edition+
description: NASCAR Heat Ultimate Edition+, the official video game of the 2020 season, the world’s most popular stockcar racing series puts you behind the wheel and challenges you to become the NASCAR Cup Series champion.

name: #1 Sudokus
description: The game to satiate your sudoku appetites!

name: Airport Simulator: Day & Night
description: The airport is a place that never sleeps.

name: Zombie Call: Trigger 3D
description: Zombie Call: Trigger 3D is an FPS game where you can kill zombies with epic weapons! As an elite commando, you were prepared to deal with the most extreme cases of advanced combat behind the enemy frontlines. Trained in shooting from modern automatic and sniper weaponry, you are the best shooter among your brothers in arms. But nothing could have prepared you for the unimaginable terror that came through a rift in the space-time continuum generated by a secret weapon hidden in a secluded military base.

name: Drums
description: Turn your Nintendo Switch into a portable drum set and learn to play anywhere, anytime.

name: Tomb of the Мask
description: Test your reflexes in a mysterious labyrinth full of enemies and deadly traps!

name: Homestuck: Felt Mansion
description: Felt Mansion is a 2D-fangame based on the Homestuck universe, developed between November 2016 and August 2019 on RPG-Maker VX Ace. Felt Mansion is an Adventure RPG mainly focused on boss fights and exploration

name: Composer
description: Rite music on the Nintendo Switch in many styles! Classical, retro, electronic, synth, pop, jazz, etc - with a controller or touchscreen.

name: Riichi City
description:
Supported by lots of known players, RiichiCity is a competitive urban-style Japanese mahjong (riichi-mahjong) game that more focus on getting 1st in each game.

It also provides some fast-paced modes for gamer to choose.

name: Ball Physics Draw Puzzles 2
description: Ball Physics Draw Puzzles is a simple and a fun puzzle game with the goal to let two balls meet each other by drawing paths on the screen. Draw Shapes and complete challenging puzzles.

name: Top Gun
description: Top Gun is a combat flight simulation game. It is based on the film of the same name, and it retells the plot of the film, with the player taking control of "Maverick" in an F-14 fighter jet.

name: Rrootage Reloaded
description: Defeat autocreated battleships in this remastered classic shoot em up by Kenta Cho. Featuring 4 different game modes and 160 stages to test your bullet hell skills.

name: Halloween Jigsaw Puzzles: Puzzle Game for Kids & Toddlers
description: The fun and unique high quality Halloween puzzle for children. Contains a variety of child-friendly scary motifs. Difficulty is adjustable.

name: Drum Box
description: The most complete drumming game on Nintendo Switch!

name: Balloon Pop
description: The best balloons educational game for kids and babies. Pop funny balloons while learning up to 14 different languages. The perfect learning fun.

name: Forêt Éternelle
description:
Forêt Éternelle is a non-profit fangame created using Pokémon SDK and RPG Maker XP.
Through a colorful universe mixing various inspirations, the game follows a non-traditionnal storyline introducing a brand new story, a new Pokédex, new regions, RPG mechanics, and more.

name: Mega Man X6 Tweaks
description: A compilation of tweaks for Mega Man X6, initially aiming only to remove the unnecessary padding and limitations the game uses to compensate for its shortcomings.

name: Impulsive Force
description: Top-down arcade game requiring awareness of the rotation of all controllable guns. The guns may help or hinder the progression of the puck to the target zone. Although one gun may be the player's primary focus consideration should be given to upcoming behaviour caused by items in their periphery.

name: I Wanna Take the Time-Machine 2
description: I Wanna Take the Time-Machine 2 is a tribute to the infamous 2D platformer 'I Wanna Be the Guy', and also a sequel to I Wanna Take the Time-Machine.

name: Jules
description: In this action 2D-platromer, inspired by retro games, you'll hop from level to level, fight against various enemies and show your skills in 6 boss fights.

name: Hidden Map
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: TechnoMagic
description: Technomagic is a free browser MMO RPG game. The battle system is based on the rules of logic. Every fight victory depends not only on luck, armor or weapons, but also on the power of your thoughts.

name: Claus Adventure
description: Claus Adventure is a platformer with elements of metroidvania, where the player, in order to pass some levels, needs to look for the appropriate skills and return to familiar levels.

name: Frogmonster
description: Discover some of the most charming and challenging bosses in Frogmonster, a Metroidvania FPS adventure where you explore a lively world filled with creatures, bugs, and beasts.

name: Lunar Lander
description:
Lunar Lander is a fan remake of the 1979 Atari game with the same name.

We wasted a lot of quarters on Lunar Lander back in the day. We have to go from memory (ugh), but it seems like the thruster sounds are different and initial landing a little more difficult than we remember. We also remember being able to rotate the ship 360 degrees. That said, it's still pretty close to the original and a great time waster.

Use your left and right arrow keys to rotate the lander and the arrow down to thrust. Joysticks are supported. Like all Crozza Games, the game is portable, so no installation is needed.

name: Missile Command
description:
Missile Command is a remake of the 1980 Atari game.

Like many of his remakes, the game is accurate but has different graphics and colors. Aim your shot correctly in front of the incoming missiles to stop them until you defeat them all or run out of missiles. Use your left, center, and right mouse buttons to fire your shot closest to the missile you want to stop for the best results. It's a straightforward game, but an excellent retro experience.

F4 will switch from full screen to windowed mode. Space will release you from the mothership and shoot upwards at enemies. Left and right arrow keys to maneuver, and down arrow for thrust. Like all Crozza Games, the game is portable, so no installation is needed

name: Spiders Everywhere
description: Spiders Everywhere is a cute 2D side-scolling run ‘n gun action game in a vintage rubberhose cartoon style, accompanied by old school jazz-music. The game has only one level, but it’s very challenging. Fast reflexes are crucial for success.

name: Luckitown
description: Luckitown is a turn-based tower defense where you roll dice to build new structures and cast spells to defend your town.

name: Slime Village VR
description: Slime Village VR is a 3D sandbox in cute Lowpoly graphics, created especially for virtual reality glasses.

name: Zombie War
description: Zombie War is a strategic FPS TPS shooting game to relieve stress. Perform missions in the war against zombies. Even beginners can easily start the game at the training ground. A machine gun (M134), flamethrower, grenade, and flash grenade are added, with up to 2 remote allies (TCP/IP).

name: Civitas
description: Civitas is a city and world builder game inspired by Renaissance map artwork. Using procedurally formed landscapes, this sandbox-style game allows you the freedom to bring your Medieval and Renaissance cities to life without the pressure of survival. Escape into a world of your own creation!

name: Jump Lanes
description: Jump Lanes is a science fiction turn based game about shipping lanes in space. Make wild profits by getting to the best opportunities first. The primary inspiration is train-based board games. If you enjoy those then this game was made for you.

name: Bejeweled Classic
description: A port of Bejeweled 3 for mobile phones, featuring the Classic, Poker, Diamond Mine, Lightning, Ice Storm, Zen, and Butterflies game modes.

name: Pesadelo: O Início
description: Pesadelo is a brazilian horror game. You will experience Alex's nightmare, a young worker atormented by stories and urban legends about his next work place. Suspense is waiting for you! Run and pray to wake up!

name: Mr.Addon in Sulpicius Gallus M
description: Action platform game themed around a cosmic renegade who battles aliens, cyborgs and others.

name: Amazing Machines
description: Puzzle game in which players must arrange the parts of machines and set them in motion.

name: Robozarro 2: Operation Atlantic
description: In Robozarro 2: Operation Atlantic, robot duo B0-3 and 0-R4 engage in turn-based combat, 2D platforming, and physics-based environmental puzzles, as they embark on an epic, alien-infested adventure through an urban wasteland known as The Nec.

name: Gunslinger Valley
description: Gunslinger Valley is a classical style fast paced arcade multiplayer shooter with western theme and modern weapons. It has multiple maps, many gamemodes and lots of weapons to choose from.

name: Newton Going Home
description: The kitten Newton went traveling with its owner to an island and when it was time to leave... Where's Newton? Newton went to discover new things on the island and got lost! Can you assemble the puzzles to help the kitten Newton get home?

name: Recursive Ruin
description: Recursive Ruin is a kaleidoscopic narrative-puzzle game. Explore an infinitely fractal world of strange beauty and mind-bending physics. Inhabit a despondent artist in search of meaning and experience a bittersweet story that cascades into the surreal.

name: Black Lazar
description: A detective noir, choose-your-own-adventure game with hand-drawn art, over 250k words, and an immersive soundtrack.

name: Elementite
description: Elementite is a third-person shooter RPG that fuses natural elements and futuristic firearms in a vast chaotic open world of challenges and secrets in a way never seen before.

name: Our Life: Now & Forever
description: A paper airplane, two new neighbors, four autumns, and a one of a kind life. Create an experience that’s all your own in this near-fully customizable, choice-heavy story where you grow from childhood to adulthood.

name: The Cruel Dreamer Marchosias
description: Join Wolf on their mission to right the atrocity committed against their family. Together with the mysterious entity 'Book', Wolf will brave the monsters lurking in the shadows, explore long-forgotten ruins and solve mysterious puzzles in order to reach an ancient castle located between worlds.

name: Straight Ahead
description: Rage deathrun-platformer with a twist.

name: Aboard the Adventure
description: Aboard the adventure is a humorous adventure game in which you will be part of the team of the daring Captain Quinn, with the objective of defeating the sinister Professor Weaver in a race to get several ancient and mysterious artifacts that can change the destiny of the world.

name: Fighting Mad Lads
description: Fighting Mad Lads is a fast-paced party game, for two to four local players set in “Neo-City” where the rules are changing each round. It’s time to party & to fight ! Challenge your friends through 5 mini-games and become the new King of the streets (and the master of the couch).

name: Exes Assault!!
description: A BL Bara Romantic Comedy Visual Novel

name: Hidden Islands
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Pengu Never Left
description: A small game about a penguin named Pengu who lives on a tiny island. Fish and relax as the days pass by.

name: The Black Cat Magician
description: A laidback animal RPG: help Cloudy the Black Cat protect her tower!

name: SokoWinter
description: Save the winter pushing the ice blocks in the water altars in this sokoban game.

name: Agonize
description: Once a mad scientist's lab, now an abandoned manor haunted by miscreations. Work as a 1-4 player team in this online co-op, psychological horror game and discover what lurks within. Find a cure before it's too late...

name: The Monstrous Frontier
description: A turn based city biulder, where you have to manage increasingly complex production lines, attract adventurers to your city and create Quests to protect yourself instead of controlling them directly.

name: Dead No-Head
description: Dead No-Head is a third person action adventure story rich game in which Norix is brought back from the dead, with... No head! This headless hero will have quite the unexpected journey ahead of him.

name: Kill to Live
description: Your health decreases with every second and extermination of enemies is the most effective way to restore it. Don't sit still if you want to stay alive.

name: Late Bird
description: Late Bird is a short interactive story about birds, movies, suicidal thoughts and not growing up in time.

name: Soul Light
description: Kaya is a simple herbalist who denies her magic. But her native forest began to die, and only she can save it. A fellow tribe named Hary and an unfamiliar witch Anna, who is pursuing her goals will help her in this. Will Kaya be able to save the forest and not die on her own?

name: Adarin Farm
description: Adarin Farm is a roguelite farm simulation game where you loot rare fertilizers to improve your farm. Chill, relax and loot your way to victory!

name: Axiallis
description: Tetris like sci-fi block puzzle game

name: How to Bathe Your Cat: Impossible Mission
description: Bathing a cat is a difficult task, but sometimes it's necessary. Use drills, blowers, rockets and a grappling hook to destroy the ground and make the water reach the cat! Can you complete this hard mission?

name: Tough Law
description: A beat 'em up adventure with paperboard style characters in which you can punch a lot and feel your adrenaline soar with so much action and rock and roll!

name: Duloga
description: a reverse space shooter where you choose who lives and dies. can you survive 7 nights?

name: Saviour of Humanity
description: "Saviour of Humanity" is a classic 2D side-scrolling platformer about a tough soldier.

name: Break
description: Lovingly hand crafted retro FPS, featuring one of the most beautiful and intuitive level editors ever made.

name: Guns N Stuff 2
description: A fast-paced third-person shooter with up to four players. Fight with a variety of 30+ weapons on 25+ maps. Grab a weapon as quickly as possible, whether it is a simple pistol or a viking helmet, and get to killing.

name: Pyramid Quest
description: Pyramid Quest is an exploration and treasure-hunting game inspired by classic platform games. The goal is to find the three parts of an artefact and open the gate to the next level while collecting diamonds and coins.

name: The Red Exile
description: The Red Exile is a Survival Horror game with procedural level generation, perks, and an AI-controlled Killer.

name: Spinning Maze
description: Control and rotate the maze to reach the end.

name: Dark Flame
description: You are a flame that is about to go out, quickly find the exit before time runs out!

name: Mirror of Immortality
description: Mirror of Immortality is an online game of real-time combat and survival adventure. Each player has only one life. Please be careful with your choice every time.

name: Skazka
description: A tale of goodness, heroism, love for one's neighbor and self-sacrifice. Embark on a dangerous adventure, fight demons and solve riddles to find the magic flower and heal the dying mother ...

name: If You Win...You Lose !
description: A quite difficult and quite original platform adventure game, die and retry.

name: Sharon and the Last Garden
description: Cleanse the world with the power of bacteria.

name: Downslope
description: The Mountain awaits.

name: Ryclaw: Save Yourself
description: When embittered scientist, Keller, hijacks the research station and sets the reactor to explode it becomes a race against time to escape. Find your colleagues, avoid lethal traps and overcome impossible odds to reach safety. Can you save your friends? Can you even save yourself?

name: Deliria
description: Sad? Lonely? Come to DELIRIA, a special bar where EVERYONE is welcome! If you're lost... You might even find your true self! Choose a drink and get ready for revelations! Make friends with peculiar characters, from all colors of the rainbow! And stay for the show of a lifetime!

name: Theomachia
description: Theomachia is a permadeath action game in which you take on increasingly difficult waves of enemies using psychokinetic abilities. The environment is your only weapon. Use it to fight off dangerous enemies - beings from another dimension sent to conquer yours.

name: Freeze the Time
description: Freeze the time is a puzzle game with a 2D view. The goal of the game is to bring the character to the exit. When a button is pressed, the doors open. There are also saws on the levels that must be avoided. By holding down the left mouse button, you can control the movement of the level.

name: Bubbles Shot
description: Bubbles Shot is a powerful pop game with a complete solution of bubble shooter. The more identical bubbles, the more points. Featuring several types of bubbles and a Level Map with 20 levels.

name: Princess
